Hero.paragraph: PulseBear is the easiest way to monitor your SaaS. Get instant notifications for sales, new users, or any other event sent directly to your Discord.

features.realtime: Real-time Discord alerts for critical events
features.track: Track sales, new users, or any other event

realtime.title: Real-time notifications
realtime.desc: Get notified about ritical events the moment they happen, no matter if you're at home or on the go.

event.title: Track Any Event
event.desc: From new user signups to successful payments, PulseBear notifies you for all critical events in your SaaS.

properties.title: Track Any Properties
properties.desc: Add any custom data you like to an event, such as a user email, a purchase amount or an exceeded quota.

integration.title: Easy Integration
integration.desc: Connect PulseBear with your existing workflows in minutes and call our intuitive logging API from any language.

testimonial1.content: PulseBear has been a game-changer for me. I've been using it for two months now and seeing sales pop up in real-time is super satisfying.

testimonial2.content: PulseBear's been paying off for our SaaS. Nice to have simple way to see how we're doing day-to-day. Definitely makes our lives easier.
